About

Hello! I am a web developer with experience in both back-end and front-end development. Over the past five years, I have developed web services for the manufacturing sector, gaining valuable experience through various projects at Samsung Electronics.

In 2018, I contributed to the development of a program to manage Samsung Electronics' home appliances and mobile products (G-MES). More recently, in 2023, I participated in the development of the Samsung Semiconductor environmental safety project (DS EHS).

My main programming expertise lies in Java and React:

• Java : I have extensive experience in Java Spring-based development, having worked on numerous projects that required building robust and scalable back-end systems. My work has involved designing and implementing various services and APIs, ensuring high performance and security.

• React : I have significant involvement in SAP projects utilizing React, where I contributed to developing interactive and responsive user interfaces. Additionally, I have dedicated considerable time to personal study and projects focused on React, further enhancing my proficiency in this technology.

These experiences have provided me with a solid foundation in both Java and React, enabling me to effectively handle complex development tasks and deliver high-quality solutions.
